title: Advanced Resume Writing and Branding
headline: Study the techniques of writing and building a résumé to build your credibility and brand with this free online course.
description: This résumé writing course will help you create your own branded résumé in a professional and attractive way to help you land more job interviews and present your qualifications in the best way possible. You will learn about job market challenges and how to overcome competition as well as some bonus content that includes insights into the mindset of hiring managers and HR processes in screening CVs, to improve your chance to get more call-backs.
courseDescription:
The main challenge when you apply for a position is how to get noticed by recruiters and hiring managers to be invited for an interview and get the job. This is not an easy task as recruiters receive hundreds of job applications every day, and if you don't stand out from the crowd, you will not be noticed. The aim of this CV writing course is to address all of these points and ensure that you are guaranteed a competitive advantage in the market.

This course will help you write a professional résumé step-by-step so that you show each part of your qualifications in an attractive and impressive way.  It will show you how to apply for a role, starting from writing an email to following up with recruiters and technical managers. You will also learn about the job market and how companies fill positions, to find out the best way to reach employers, find your way into their application process and overcome the competition.

If you are tired of sending your résumé without getting any response and don't feel confident about your résumé then you should enrol in this practical course. Attract the attention of hiring managers at the company of your dreams by presenting and marketing yourself in a professional, creative and in-depth way and become a better job seeker and interviewer by powering up your job search.
